InnoPhase
  • Programming in Windows
  • View page source

The INP3000 Programmer board version 4.0 has a 2 PIN UART and 4 PIN UART interface to program Talaria TWO modules.

Programming in Windows

Programming the Application and Data Image over UART

To flash over UART in Windows environment, Download Tool available in pc_tools directory of the SDK release package is used.

For more information, refer the following document: UG_Download_Tool.pdf (sdk_x.y\pc_tools\Download_Tool\doc).

Note: To flash the certificate files using the Download Tool, follow the instructions in section: File System of the document: UG_Download_Tool.pdf (sdk_x.y\pc_tools\Download_Tool\doc).

Programming in Linux

Programming the Application and Data Image over UART

To flash over UART in Linux environment, Download Tool available in pc_tools directory of the SDK release package is used.

For more information, refer the following document: UG_Download_Tool.pdf (sdk_x.y\pc_tools\Download_Tool\doc).
